# Investment Request: AI/ML Capabilities

## Proposal
We want to build AI and machine learning capabilities. AI is the future and we need to be part of it. Every company is investing in AI right now.

## Why AI
- AI is transforming industries
- Customers expect AI-powered features
- Competitors are investing heavily
- It's an exciting technology

## Current State
We don't have much AI capability today. Our team has some interest but limited experience. We've done some small experiments.

## Vision
With AI we could:
- Make our product smarter
- Automate things
- Provide better insights
- Do things we can't do today

## Approach
We would need to:
- Hire AI talent
- Buy some tools
- Build some models
- Integrate into product

## Investment
Significant investment would be needed:
- Hiring: Multiple headcount
- Tools/Infrastructure: Cloud compute, ML platforms
- Training: Upskilling existing team
- Timeline: Multi-year initiative

Total investment likely in the millions over several years.

## Risks
- AI is complex
- Talent is hard to find
- Projects may not succeed
- Technology is evolving fast

## Request
Approve funding to begin building AI capabilities. Start with a small team and prove value before scaling.
